name: Swords & Bones 3
description:
Swords and Bones 3 is a game inspired by 80s and 90s action-platformer games with a modern and polished level design. Off course, all in pixel-art!
In the game you will take on the role of a young rogue, able to move with much more agility than the heroes of the previous two chapters.
A long journey awaits you: from the dungeon to the lair of the last boss; you will face a series of levels filled with traps and nasty enemies.
In Swords & Bones, you will put your skills to the test thanks to a balanced and never unfair difficulty.
Each enemy you annihilate will earn you coins to spend on new spells, items and power-ups!
Will you be able to win the whole game and see the real ending?

Features:

  • A new story!
  • Dodge attacks and boosts your agility!
  • Use combos to annihilate enemies!
  • Improved graphics!
  • 4 new devastating spells to master!
  • Power up your hero collecting coins!
  • Over 50 action-packed levels!
  • 6 fearsome bosses ready to fight!
  • Two endings to discover!
  • Pixel-art graphics in 16-bit style!
  • An epic and dark chiptune soundtrack!
  • Achievements!
